Load the data:

```{r}

library(aRtsy)
library(tidyverse)

```

```{r}

set.seed(86976)
canvas_ribbons(
  colors = c(
    '#910319',
    '#00378e',
    '#4b2c16',
    '#eaa300',
    '#c38430',
    '#b20020',
    '#0e134c'
  ),
  background = '#dacfc3',
  triangle = T
) +
  theme(
    plot.margin = unit(c(0.7,0,-0.2,0), "in")
  )

ggsave('final_graphs/triangle/triangle.png', width = 600, height = 1000, units = 'px')


```

```{r}

set.seed(10978)
canvas_squares(
  colors = c('#000000',
             '#482915',
             '#d9ccbf',
             '#ecb116',
             '#e1294c',
             '#036345',
             '#184a96'),
  background = '#d9ccbf',
  ratio = 1,
  cuts = 20
) +
  theme(
    plot.background = element_rect(fill = '#d9ccbf'),
    plot.margin = unit(c(0.8,0,0,0.5), "in")
  )
  
ggsave('final_graphs/squares/squares.png', width = 800, height = 1000, units = 'px')

```

```{r}

set.seed(19898)
canvas_segments(
  colors = c(
    '#e2a82d',
    '#7c87a5'
  ),
  background = '#ddcbbb',
  size = 1.5,
  H = 0.3,
  n = 100
)

ggsave('final_graphs/woven/woven.png', width = 800, height = 1000, units = 'px')

```
